title: [1.7.10][ssp]Damage Source——伤害来源追踪
author: cafe_X
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cafe_X 于 2015-11-28 21:19 编辑 

这个mod可以向玩家显示他们收到的伤害，以及伤害的来源。目前，作者只是把它作为一个调试工具。
——————————————————————————————




——————————————————————————————

作者的原话

Display to players the amount of damage they suffer, as well as the source of the damage.
For example:PlayerXX damaged for 3.0 by EntityZombie(mob)PlayerXX  damaged for 4.0 by EntitySlime(mob)PlayerXX damaged for 1.0 by inFirePlayerXX damaged for 1.0 by onFirePlayerXX  damaged for 1.0 by starvePlayerXX  damaged for 7.0 by fallAs of now, this is more a debugging tool than a mod you would use daily...Let me know if you would like some improvements, like to put the output in a sort of book you can look when you want instead of having a constant output in the chat.This mod was created after a request from Iskandar, to track the origin of random damages that appears to come from nowhere...


正在尝试汉化……但十有八九会失败。
——————————————————————————————
下载

replies.author: hill653
replies.txt_content:
百度的翻译：
向玩家展示他们遭受的伤害，以及伤害的来源。例如：playerxx损坏3 entityzombie（MOB）playerxx??损坏4 entityslime（MOB）playerxx损坏1在playerxx损坏1??着火playerxx损坏1饿死playerxx??损坏的7下降为现在，这更是一个比一个mod调试工具，你可以使用每日…让我知道，如果你想一些改进，如把输出的一种书，你可以看时，你想，而不是有一个恒定的输出在聊天。这个mod是依斯干达的请求之后，创建，跟踪随机损伤的起源，似乎不知从哪儿来的…
